equipment.itemName: Disharmony: Lyra Bow of Collapsed Boundaries

fixedOption.explain:
Lovely Tempo effects +8%
- Canceled when unequipped
- Not applicable when registered in the Buff Enhancement Weapon slot

Nights and Dreams range +20%

Sound of the Muse shines an additional spotlight.
- Atk. +20%
- Skill range +15%
- Resets Culture Shock cooldown on hit.

Upgrades Culture Shock.
- Generates 5 additional waves for 2 sec. at the end of the skill.
- Additional Wave Atk.: 30% of Culture Shock's third wave Atk.
- Skill range +20%

Sensational Solo Performance additional Independent Atk. +20%

Buffer Lv. 50 Skill buff -50% when unequipped
